tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My pregnancy was a complicated & challenging . But Prameela mam just made it smooth. She didn‚Äôt give me any tension and handled me from day 1 of my pregnancy to 6 th month .Whatever tensions & doubts I have she used to explain it & reduced my tension‚Ä¶After that I went to my parents place. I am really thankful for Prameela mam for saving me & my daughter in my early stages of my pregnancy..!

Dr Prameela Sekhar is extremely understanding, empathetic and down to earth.
She listens very carefully to the patient's concerns, understands them and provides extremely useful and professional consultation.
She has a keen eye even for small details to identify symptoms.
She replies quickly to any patient queries with her highly experienced knowledge.

Apart from this, Apollo Kondapur clinic staff esp Rachna is extremely helpful, jovial, always available and super understanding. 
No time is wasted in waiting or booking appointments.
She always answers calls, considers each case individually and manages patient and doctor time effectively.


Both Dr Prameela and Rachna help provide care for your baby and mother by going out of their way. 

Our Story
When we approached Apollo Kondapur,  we were quickly booked by Rachna for an appointment. She even told us about the amazing outstanding packages that Apollo offers. 
We didn't had to wait for the appoitment. 
Dr Prameela listened to our case, referred the tests performed quickly and gave extremely useful consultation.  Dr Prameela also helped us deal with gestational diabetes and advised us even at out of office hours too whenever we needed her. 

This superb and personalized care helped us achieve a natural delivery.

Very bad experience, even after taking appointment, I had to wait for more than 45 minutes to meet doctor for first visit, which was rushed and for second visit waited for 1.5 hours then we were told she would take another hour to come, so we could visit next day for which they were giving no time slots.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: ** ******** ******* ** *** **** ** ************* *** ********** ******* I have been consulting throughput my pregnancy she never irritated by my questions, she will always have time to listen to patients. She will understand the situation of patient and treat accordingly. I have changed my medicine plenty of times (coz i hate medicine üòÄ) but she never refuse to change it. She is the best doctor to go for as she treats high risk pregnancy as well. Big üëç to doctor and her Patience. Thank you

review: I am very thankful to Dr.Prameela Shekar Madam.she explains the problem  to the patient in  friendly manner.I like the way she talks with the patient.I feel the best Gynaecology Doctor is K.Prameela Shekar Madam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Our family is immensely thankful towards Dr. Prameela for the smooth delivery of our baby. We consulted her from 7 th month of pregnancy. We would highly recommend Dr. Prameela for both pregnancy and post-pregnancy related issues. From our experience we can say that she is always available through call and messages for her patients.  We need more doctors like her.-- Always thankful.

This is the first time I have visited this doctor. She is very good at explaining the issues and outcomes based on ones condition. I have asked so many questions , since I had some scan issues which were done as part of pre conception screening. She explained in detail about everything what I have asked. Spent 15 minutes with her and in my experience so far with multiple gynecologists, nobody cared to spend so much of time. Am really proud that I have found her. She is very calm , polite and good to patients, which gives a hope in you.Thank you doc
